entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
